text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump No, you idiot: you've previously lost 15-30 *million* jobs due to the shutdown & #coronavirus.

The re-opening restored 4.8 million.

You're still in a very, very deep hole.

#Fake45 #FakeJobGains #FuckTrumpism
